name: Starsight
text: You can observe the night sky and all of its celestial bodies as if it were a clear night, regardless of weather conditions that would otherwise block your view. Your vision penetrates any light pollution from nonmagical sources, though this spell doesn’t function in daylight, indoors, or underground. You see through forest canopies and similar natural obstructions, but only for the purpose of stargazing. For the spell’s duration, you gain a +2 insight bonus on Knowledge (geography) checks relating to the stars and planets and Survival checks to avoid getting lost.
text_zh: 你能观察夜空与空中的天体，如同待在一个洁明的夜晚，无论是什么样的天气状况，都不会阻碍你的视线。你的视线能穿透任何非魔法的光污染，尽管此法术在白天、室内与地下室都不起作用。你能看透林冠与类似的自然障碍物，但仅在你凝望星尘时这样做。在法术的持续时间内，你在观察星晨与行星时，知识(地理)的检定上获得+2内在加值，以及也在避免迷路的生存检定上获得此加值。
